text: Women prefer to talk in twos, while men prefer to talk in threes.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: Men become much more attractive when they start looking older. But it doesn't do much for women, though we do have an advantage: make-up.
author: Bette Davis

text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
author: Jane Austen

text: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
author: George Jean Nathan

text: Time destroys the speculation of men, but it confirms nature.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
